profiles.name: Demo Sine Wave
profiles.description: Virtual signal generator producing a clean sine wave at 32 kHz. Requires no hardware - perfect for testing the UI and plotting pipeline.

profiles.name: RTL-SDR FM Broadcast
profiles.description: Wide-band FM broadcast monitoring centered at 98.5 MHz. Optimized for RTL-SDR Blog v3 or similar dongles with 2.048 MSPS sample rate and blackman windowing.
profiles.use_case: FM radio monitoring, spectrum analysis, SDR introduction

profiles.name: RTL-SDR Solar Monitoring (20.1 MHz)
profiles.description: Long-duration solar and Jovian radio emission monitoring at 20.1 MHz. Configured for 10-minute batches with Hann windowing for spectral analysis of natural radio sources.
profiles.hardware_type: RTL-SDR with upconverter or direct sampling mod
profiles.use_case: Solar monitoring, Jupiter radio observation, radio astronomy
